name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-property-bag-editor
title: Property Bag Navigation Web parts
shortDescription: A set of web parts that lets you set property bag settings on site collections and enable navigation using those properties.
longDescription: A set of web parts that lets you set property bag settings on site collections and enable navigation using those properties.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
